>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"additionalMetadata":{"description":"Additional data to pass to server","type":"string"},"file":{"description":"file to upload","type":"string","format":"binary"}}}}}}}

</RequestSchema>
